backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, access control, transaction storage, monthly filtering, and monthly totals calculations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to associated source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark mode color variables and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the React app and linking the main script and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile setup flow, and rendering the authenticated layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login screen with Internet Identity authentication and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first‑time users to input and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/charts/IncomeVsE: Renders a bar chart comparing monthly income and expenses using fetched totals, with loading and compact display modes.
frontend/src/components/disclosures/Manu: Shows a notice informing users that all transactions must be entered manually.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, page switching, monthly reminder banner, and logout flow.
frontend/src/components/month/MonthPicke: Provides controls to navigate between months and displays the selected month and year.
frontend/src/components/notifications/Mo: Displays a dismissible banner reminding users to view the previous month's summary when a new month starts.
frontend/src/components/summary/MonthlyT: Shows monthly totals for received, sent, and balance amounts with icons and loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Form for adding income or expense transactions with validation and submission to the backend.
Lists monthly transactions with income/expense indicators and handles loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on user identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides React Query hooks to load and save the logged‑in user's profile via the actor API with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMonthlyReminder.ts: Manages a per‑principal monthly reminder state using localStorage, with helpers to toggle, acknowledge, and check reminders.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file documenting where feature-specific query hooks are defined.
frontend/src/hooks/useSelectedMonth.ts: Stores and persists the selected month and year in localStorage for UI state.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Provides React Query hooks to add transactions and fetch monthly transactions and totals via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark theme color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with ReactDOM, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders settings UI showing profile info, principal ID, and reminder toggle, plus about/disclosure sections.
frontend/src/pages/SummaryPage.tsx: Displays a monthly financial summary with totals, balance, charts, and auto‑acknowledges the viewed month.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Shows monthly transaction overview with totals, chart preview, add‑transaction form, and transaction list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides functions to read URL params (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and registers typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, required images, implemented features, and architecture notes for a monthly payment tracker.
